sense.name: (Cause to) assume a (degraded) shape.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] DEFORM NP2[patient] NP1[cause] DEFORM NP2[patient]
sense.examples: The heat deformed the plastic sculpture. The strong man could deform an iron bar. Leprosy deformed his body. The sidewalk deformed during the earthquake.

sense.name: Assume a different shape or form volitionally.
sense.examples: The Queen deformed into a vicious monster. A wizard can deform into any shape.
